case.title: asian needs friend to hang out with. - 31 (london, central)
case.text:
31yr. asian. going to stay in central london for next 6months.
looking to meet some local brits to hang out with !
been to London several times, so I dont need a travel guide but some cool new friends.
You got mine, so your pic is a must to get my reply ( please fully clothed ) ^^
I am the right one. and we not twins. ^^
